description: Span Variants Test - Comprehensive battery of 9 working memory span tasks

parameters.name: forward_digit_order
parameters.description: Execution order for forward digit span (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: backward_digit_order
parameters.description: Execution order for backward digit span (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: forward_letter_order
parameters.description: Execution order for forward letter span (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: backward_letter_order
parameters.description: Execution order for backward letter span (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: forward_mixed_order
parameters.description: Execution order for forward mixed digit/letter span (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: backward_mixed_order
parameters.description: Execution order for backward mixed digit/letter span (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: digit_ordering_order
parameters.description: Execution order for digit ordering task (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: letter_ordering_order
parameters.description: Execution order for letter ordering task (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: mixed_ordering_order
parameters.description: Execution order for mixed ordering task (0=skip, else order number)

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input method: keyboard (top row numbers), keypad (numeric keypad), or mouse

parameters.name: UseAudio
parameters.description: Presentation mode: 0=video only, 1=audio+video, 2=audio only (works for digits and letters C,H,K,N,R,W,X,Y)

parameters.name: AllowBackspace
parameters.description: Allow users to backspace over responses (1=yes, 0=no)

parameters.name: AllowSkip
parameters.description: Allow users to skip over cells with '-' key (1=yes, 0=no)

parameters.name: responsemode
parameters.description: Layout response mode (use 'none' for manual keyboard input)

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Test progression type: 1=low-to-high (traditional), 2=high-to-low, 3=staircase

parameters.name: endearly
parameters.description: End list length when criterion is met (1=yes, 0=test all trials)

parameters.name: upperbound
parameters.description: The longest list length to test

parameters.name: lowerbound
parameters.description: The shortest list length to test

parameters.name: perlength
parameters.description: The number of trials at each length

parameters.name: criterion
parameters.description: Number of correct trials needed to proceed to next length

parameters.name: staircasestart
parameters.description: Starting list length for staircase method (version=3)

parameters.name: staircasetrials
parameters.description: Number of trials for staircase method (version=3)

parameters.name: ISI
parameters.description: Inter-stimulus interval in milliseconds

parameters.name: iti
parameters.description: Inter-trial interval in milliseconds

parameters.name: letter_set
parameters.description: Set of letters to use for letter span tasks (easily distinguishable, audio support for C,H,K,N,R,W,X,Y)
